pullRequest.title: Update docs to reflect node.processors
pullRequest.bodyText:
We namespaced the previous setting "processors" into "node.processors". This commit updates some of the documentation to reflect this.
Relates #45855
Closes #54815

commit.message:
Update docs to reflect node.processors

We namespaced the previous setting "processors" into
"node.processors". This commit updates some of the documentation to
reflect this.
